__e: - Walter's great, Walter is always great.
Walter, I didn't know you were going to be here tonight.
Walter, may I not ride with you tonight?
- Yes, Walter, leave. Go on, get out! - No, Walter, you can't go.
Jesus Christ, Walter, you got a gun?
Walter, I can't tell you how delighted I am.
- Walter, what are you doing out here?
I WAS LOOKING AT CARLA'S PICTURE.
WELL, WALTER, WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE SO EARLY ? I'VE BROUGHT SOMETHING.
- What now? - What should we say?
I WAS LOOKING AT CARLA'S PICTURE.
WELL, WALTER, WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE SO EARLY ? I'VE BROUGHT SOMETHING.
You've all had time to speak with the Major, WaIter and my son.
What's right for Walter and myself?
This is Walter's home, and he expects to find me in it when he comes back on leave.
OH, WALTER, I WANNA BE WITH YOU.
Walter... I have 32 men in precisely the same position you're in. How is it that I spend most of my time listening to you?
Walter, I really don't think it's such a good idea.
